frontmatter.title: Jillian C. York (Electronic Frontier Foundation)
frontmatter.subtitle: Presented by the Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure at UMass Amherst
frontmatter.author: Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure
frontmatter.excerpt: Jillian C. York, the Director for International Freedom of Expression at the Electronic Frontier Foundation, joins us to talk about censorship on social media platforms and her new book Silicon Values, out now on Verso.
